quotes.quote: Those who never retract their opinions love themselves more than they love truth.
Inquire not what are the opinions of any one; but inquire what is truth.
If you want me to treat your ideas with more respect, get some better ideas.
Opinions, like weapons, are often made for defense as well as offense.
He who has no opinion of his own, but depends upon the opinion and taste of others, is a slave.
If you wish to see the truth, then hold no opinion for or against.
The greatest deception which men incur proceeds from their opinions.
Everyone has the right to their own opinionâ€¦ Yours is just wrong.
The man who never alters his opinion is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind.
You are not entitled to your opinion. You are entitled to your informed opinion. No one is entitled to be ignorant.
The fewer the facts, the stronger the opinion.
Public opinion is no more than this: what people think that other people think.
There are as many opinions as there are people.
It is not truth, but opinion that can travel the world without a passport.
An opinion which excites no opposition at all is not worth having!
People do not seem to realize that their opinion of the world is also a confession of character.
Never judge someone by the opinion of others.
If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
It's funny how people have strong opinions on things they know nothing about.
Opinions cannot survive if one has no chance to fight for them.
Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality.
Just because they disagree, doesn't mean you ain't right.
Don't let your opinion sway your judgment.
Opinion is the medium between knowledge and ignorance.
The opinion which other people have of you is their problem not yours.
If you're going to say what you want to say, you're going to hear what you don't want to hear.
The rule is perfect: in all matters of opinion our adversaries are insane.
There are as many opinions as there are experts.
Your opinion is not my reality.
